statements: DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100 AND merchant_name = 'Amazon';
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM merchant_details WHERE merchant_name = 'Apple Store';
DELETE FROM merchant_details WHERE merchant_name = 'ExampleMerchant' AND merchant_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'failed' AND transaction_notes LIKE '%fraud%';
